mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Indiana", "The Bunkhouse Reel", and "Square Dance Jubilee" ROUND DANCES "Waltzing a Round" and "Swingin' Along" SPECIAL FEATURES "Square Dance Records, 1955", "Don't Just Stand" and "Musical Notations and Rhythms". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Square Dance Picture", "Women on the Square", "Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
